name: inexhaustible
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
existing in very great amounts that will never be finished: inexhaustible supply There seemed to be an inexhaustible supply of champagne at the wedding.

Add to word list
existing in such large amounts that it cannot be used completely or cannot come to an end: There’s a nearly inexhaustible supply of people willing to buy those homes.
